BasicInfo.short: Revision3 is a multi-channel internet television network that creates, produces and distributes web television shows on niche topics.

Products.name: Scam School
Products.description: Award-winning magician Brian Brushwood takes viewers on an inside tour of bar tricks, street cons, and scams.

Products.name: The Digg Reel
Products.description: The Digg Reel, hosted by Andrew Bancroft, covers the top rated videos from Digg

Products.name: The Revision3 Gazette
Products.description: The Revision3 Gazette, hosted by Sarah Lane, is a show about the people who create favorite shows.

Products.name: PixelPerfect
Products.description: PixelPerfect, hosted by digital artist Bert Monroy, teaches the tips and tricks of Adobe Photoshop and Illustrator.

Products.name: Diggnation
Products.description: Diggnation, hosted by Alex Albrecht and Kevin Rose, is a weekly tech/web culture show based on the top digg.com social bookmarking news

Products.name: Tekzilla
Products.description: Tekzilla, hosted by Patrick Norton and Veronica Belmont, delivers product reviews, computer help, tech tips on everything from iPods to

Products.name: popSiren
Products.description: popSiren is a show at the intersection of modern culture, technology, science and making stuff that actually works.

Products.name: Social Brew
Products.description: Social Brew, hosted by Irene McGee, was a show about the world of social networking services, from Linked-in to Facebook, Myspace and

Products.name: The Totally Rad Show
Products.description: Every week, hosts Alex Albrecht, Dan Trachtenberg, and Jeff Cannata talks about the world of movies, video games, tv and comics.
